She's devoted to making it the best dedicated sports network in the world. My friend Ed has been having a crush on this girl named Jo for eight years. He is still holding out false hope that one day he'll become her boyfriend but Jo has a boyfriend. Hes just being a doormat. During their trip to thailand he bought lots of presents and keepsakes for jo and paid for all of her meals but at the end he ran out of money so he had to ask Jo to lend him some money who's now saying that ed is stating close to her to take advantage of her and her money. They stayed in a twin room which has a pair of twin beds rather than a double bed. She told ed that whe wouldn't sleep with any guys until she was married which we all know isn't true. That's why he's still holding out false hope that very soon he'll be her boyfriend. Jo recently demanded that Ed buy her a Gucci limited edition handbag which cost twenty seven thousand dollars. Ed bought it but when he realised that she was taking advantage of him again he felt very upset. Another girl named Shirley who he fancied took him to a beauty parlour and sold him facial sessions for over twelve thousand dollars. Ed didn't know he was being taken advantage of until he made his payment on his credit card. As soon as he made his payment Shirley's whole manner changed. he ended up working as a security guard whose salary is twelve thousand dollars. Recently he said he wanted to take a shot at the CPA exam and become an accountant with better career prospects.
